name: Content Depth
description: Tests the model's ability to create presentation content with appropriate depth and detail

prompts.text: Create a presentation on quantum computing for a graduate-level physics seminar. The presentation should go beyond basics and include detailed explanations of quantum bits, quantum gates, quantum entanglement, quantum algorithms (specifically Shor's and Grover's algorithms), and current challenges in quantum computing development.

Create a presentation providing an in-depth analysis of the electric vehicle market for automotive industry executives. Include detailed market segmentation, growth projections by region, battery technology developments, competitive landscape analysis, regulatory impacts, and consumer adoption barriers.

detail_level.description: Appropriate level of detail for the topic and audience

concept_exploration.description: Thorough exploration of concepts beyond surface level

nuance_recognition.description: Recognition and explanation of nuances and complexities

supporting_evidence.description: Inclusion of specific supporting details and evidence
